#define gc getchar_unlocked
using namespace std;
void scanint(int &x)
{
	register int c=gc();
	x=0;
	int neg=0;
	for(;((c<48||c>57)&&c!='-');c=gc());
	if(c=='-')
	{
		neg=1;c=gc();
	}
	for(;c>47&&c<58;c=gc())
	{
		x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-48;
	}
		if(neg)
		x=-x;
	}
int binary(int a[],int k,int low,int high)
{
                int mid,l;
                mid = (low+high)/2;
                if (low>high)
                return (low-1);
                else if(a[mid]==k)
                return mid;
                else if (a[mid]>k)
                {l=binary(a,k,low,mid-1);
                return l;}
                else {l=binary(a,k,mid+1,high);
                return l;}
}
